statements: SELECT * FROM material_sourcing
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM material_sourcing
SELECT * FROM material_sourcing WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A'
SELECT material_name, sourcing_date FROM material_sourcing ORDER BY sourcing_date DESC
SELECT * FROM material_sourcing WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM material_sourcing WHERE supplier_location = 'New York' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM material_sourcing WHERE sourcing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sourcing_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY sourcing_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_location FROM material_sourcing WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'Acme%' AND material_name = 'Steel' ORDER BY supplier_location;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(material_id) AS total_materials FROM material_sourcing GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(material_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_materials DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_location FROM material_sourcing WHERE material_name IN ('Steel', 'Aluminum', 'Plastic') ORDER BY supplier_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT material_name, material_id FROM materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, location FROM materials JOIN suppliers ON materials.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity, location FROM materials JOIN suppliers ON materials.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT material_id, material_name, supplier_name, location FROM materials JOIN suppliers ON materials.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY material_name ASC, supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_sources;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, sourcing_location FROM material_sources;
SELECT * FROM construction_projects WHERE location='New York';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE project_id=5;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, purchase_quantity, purchase_date FROM sourcing_analysis WHERE analysis_id=3;
SELECT * FROM material_sources ORDER BY material_name ASC, supplier_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT material_name, sourcing_date FROM material_sources WHERE sourcing_location='Factory A' ORDER BY sourcing_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM material_sources GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT material_name, SUM(purchase_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sourcing_analysis GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT * FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM material_sources;
SELECT material_name, source_location FROM material_sources WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, country FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT project_id, material_name, quantity FROM project_materials WHERE quantity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM material_sources;
SELECT material_name, supplier_id, source_location FROM material_sources WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM material_sources GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM project_materials JOIN projects ON project_materials.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE project_id = 1;

SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity FROM projects JOIN project_materials ON projects.project_id = project_materials.project_id JOIN material_sources ON project_materials.material_id = material_sources.material_id;
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM material_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, price, quantity FROM materials WHERE price > 50;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity_used FROM project_materials JOIN materials ON project_materials.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT material_name, price, quantity FROM materials WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity_used FROM projects JOIN project_materials ON projects.project_id = project_materials.project_id JOIN materials ON project_materials.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_person FROM material_suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM materials WHERE price < 100);
